body: Thank you galgbang for the links

shit, i loved this series SO FLIPPIN MUCH when it was all just wholesome vanilla dad-rape and such*. whether hero or amu, 2D or 3, this sad old world offers nothing cuter, hotter or THIKKER than arimura's fmc. the no-lie all-time sweetest cream yet drawn. could use about a thousand chapters of her getting wrecked by dimwit dad. ... BUT NO. now she has to go around fucking random eye bleach hobos for no reason. the incest magic is gone. all my tears cannot bring it back. ... (* https://nhentai.net/g/283902/ , https://nhentai.net/g/216491/ , https://nhentai.net/g/289182/ , https://nhentai.net/g/289140/ )
